item.title: Report X-2025030123
item.description:
Report X-2025030123

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T18:18:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-26
  • City: SYLMAR
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE IN THE UNLOAD AT DOOR9. UPON ARRIVEL NOTICED ACLASS 8 CORROSIVE DIAMOND LABEL. FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE WAS LEAD TO CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET. FOLLOWED ACTION STEPS AND CLEANED UP SPILL AND BROUGHT TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report I-2025020062
item.description:
Report I-2025020062

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T00:52:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-26
  • City: SANTA FE SPGS
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During start of loading operation driver opened storage tank release valve before. connecting hose to CTMV. Material flowed from storage tank into retention area before flow was halted. Hose was connected and shipment was loaded without additional incident. Facility personnel handled released material and processed.properly. Driver received remedial training in proper loading procedures and practices.

item.title: Report I-2025020061
item.description:
Report I-2025020061

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T00:52:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-17
  • City: El Segundo
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During loading operation driver failed to verify all valves and closures on storage tank, were closed and secured before operation began. As loading started, product was released from the bleeder valve on the storage tank which was not closed. Operations halted and closure sealed on storage tank. Loading completed without additional incident. Facility personnel cleaned released material.

item.description:
Report X-2025021271

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-01T21:20:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-13
  • City: ONTARIO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING CLEAN UP AND INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGE HIT THE FLOOR OF THE TRAILER AND A BUTANE LIGHTER CRACKED AND LEAKED. DAMAGE INSPECTION; LIGHTERS - INNER BOXES ARE MARKED AND LABELED LIGHTERS WITH 2.1 FLAMMBLE GAS DIAMOND (28 PKGS). TRACKING NUMBERS: 1Z4X98060394530621, 1Z4X98060394514934, 1Z4X98060392374107, 1Z4X98060393028248, 1Z4X98060391045885, 1Z4X98060390743819, 1Z4X98060390839770, 1Z4X98060393603670, 1Z4X98060390502007, 1Z4X98060392953491, 1Z4X98060390671978, 1Z4X98060391508447, 1Z4X98060390512014, 1Z4X98060390626768, 1Z4X98060394706727, 1Z4X98060393907253, 1Z4X98060393206831, 1Z4X98060391553291, 1Z4X98060396116021, 1Z4X98060391418857, 1Z4X98060394674968, 1Z4X98060391955026, 1Z4X98060391682660, 1Z4X98060390290862, 1Z4X98060391613985, 1Z4X98060392566203, 1Z4X98060390195877 AND 1Z4X98060391855616
